languages.text: Холодок бежит по спине. Не покидает ощущение, что за вашими поисками наблюдает незримый смотритель.
A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.
languages.original_text: Холодок бежит по спине. Не покидает ощущение, что за вашими поисками наблюдает незримый смотритель.

traits.locale_text: A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.
A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.

A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.

languages.text: Un frisson vous parcourt l'échine. Vous avez l'impression tenace que quelqu'un vous observe depuis les ombres.
languages.original_text: A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.

traits.locale_text: Un frisson vous parcourt l'échine. Vous avez l'impression tenace que quelqu'un vous observe depuis les ombres.

languages.text: Sientes un escalofrío. Tienes la sensación de que alguien te está observando.
languages.original_text: A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.

traits.locale_text: Sientes un escalofrío. Tienes la sensación de que alguien te está observando.

languages.text: 背筋がゾクリとする。見えない何者かに見られている気がしてならない。
languages.original_text: A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.

traits.locale_text: 背筋がゾクリとする。見えない何者かに見られている気がしてならない。

languages.text: 你感觉不寒而栗。你始终感觉到，似乎有某个看不见的身影在监视着你。
languages.original_text: A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.

traits.locale_text: 你感觉不寒而栗。你始终感觉到，似乎有某个看不见的身影在监视着你。

languages.text: Dir läuft es eiskalt den Rücken hinunter. Du wirst das Gefühl nicht los, dass eine unsichtbare Gestalt dich beobachtet.
languages.original_text: A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.

traits.locale_text: Dir läuft es eiskalt den Rücken hinunter. Du wirst das Gefühl nicht los, dass eine unsichtbare Gestalt dich beobachtet.

languages.text: Kanın çekiliyor. Görünmez bir şeyin seni izlediği hissinden bir türlü kurtulamıyorsun.
languages.original_text: A chill runs down your spine. You cannot shake the feeling that some unseen figure is watching you.
